P_COMMAND_PARAM:
100000202,ラスウェル,レインの言う通り
神殿にきて正解だったということか。:None:100000102,レイン,なあ、ラスウェル。
これでわかったろ。:None:100000102,レイン,女の子の言葉は

遭わなければいいがな。:None:none:None
P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000202,"Lasswell","You have hidden wisdom, Rain.
We are needed here, just as you said."|None|100000102,"Rain","See, Lasswell?
It's just like I always say..."|None|100000102,"Rain","You can always trust a pretty face!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Hmph.
It is terribly well-hidden wisdom, isn't it."|None|none|None^100000202,"拉斯韋爾","看來聽雷因的，
來神殿是正確的。"|None|100000102,"雷因","拉斯韋爾，
你這回明白了吧？"|None|100000102,"雷因","聽女孩子的話，
是不會有錯的。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","哼，希望你以後
不要因此遭殃。"|None|none|None^100000202,"라스웰","레인의 말대로
신전에 오길 잘 한 것인가?"|None|100000102,"레인","어때, 라스웰.
이걸로 잘 알았겠지?"|None|100000102,"레인","여자 말은
안 들으면 손해라고."|None|100000202,"라스웰","흥, 그러다
큰일이나 안 나면 다행이지."|None|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Tu avais raison, Rain.
On a bien fait de venir jusqu'ici."|None|100000102,"Rain","Tu vois, Lasswell ?
Comme je le dis toujours..."|None|100000102,"Rain","... un joli minois ne ment jamais !"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Hmpf.
J'espère simplement qu'on est pas arrivés trop tard."|None|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Du hattest recht, Rain.
Wir werden hier gebraucht."|None|100000102,"Rain","He, Lasswell.
Nun hast du's verstanden, oder?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Einem hübschen Mädchen sollte man immer Vertrauen schenken!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Pah.
Ich muss mein Lob wohl zurücknehmen."|None|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Tenías razón, Rain. Nos necesitan aquí."|None|100000102,"Rain","¿Lo ves, Lasswell?

P_COMMAND_PARAM:

緊張感というものが足りん。:none:100000202,ラスウェル,だから、俺はお前が心配で
目が離せないのだ。:none:100000102,レイン,……ラスウェル。
今は俺じゃなくて敵から目を離すなよ。:none:100000202,ラスウェル,そ、そんなことわかってる！
当然のことだ！　バカにするな！:none:none:None

100000202,"Lasswell","Rain, stay focused."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","No one would deny that

to keep an eye on you."|none|100000102,"Rain","I would have thought that right now,

대체 날 뭘로 생각하는 거냐?!"|none|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Rain, tu dois rester concentré."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Personne ne peut nier que tu es l'une
des plus fines lames de Grandshelt."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Mais les prouesses physiques ne font pas tout.

garder un œil sur toi."|none|100000102,"Rain","Et si tu gardais les deux yeux

언행에도 신경을 써야 한다."|none|100000202,"라스웰","못하겠다면 내가 손수!
하나부터 열까지 지도해주지."|none|100000102,"레인","뭐어~? 나는 그럴 그릇이 아니라고.
그런 건 라스웰, 네가 알아서 해!"|none|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Rain.
Pour une fois dans nos vies, écoute-moi."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Tous les chevaliers de Grandshelt
t'admirent."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Ton langage, ton attitude...
Tu dois te montrer digne de leur servir d'exemple."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Autrement, je me verrai contraint
de t'inculquer cela... à la manière forte."|none|100000102,"Rain","J'ai rien demandé, moi.
Si t'y tiens tant que ça,
t'as qu'à leur servir d'exemple toi-même !"|none|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Rain.
Wenn du doch nur ein Mal auf mich hören würdest."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Alle Ritter Grandshelts
sehen zu dir auf."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Deine Worte, deine Taten ...
Du musst ein Vorbild sein."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Wenn du das nicht kannst ...
... werde ich dich wohl dazu nötigen müssen."|none|100000102,"Rain","Och nö. Aber Vorbild sein passt doch gar nicht zu mir.
Das überlasse ich lieber dir."|none|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Rain. Por una vez en tu vida, escúchame."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Todos los paladines de Grandshelt te consideran un modelo a seguir."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Tus palabras, tus acciones... Tienes que dar ejemplo."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","No me gusta decirte lo que tienes que hacer...
Será un alivio para los dos
el día que no tenga que hacerlo."|none|100000102,"Rain","¿Quién dijo que yo quería ser el modelo a seguir?
Si tanto te importa a ti,
¡¿por qué no lo eres tú?!"|none|none|None

P_COMMAND_PARAM:
100000202,ラスウェル,レイン。お前は才能も実力も
騎士ナンバー１だというのに……。:none:100000202,ラスウェル,面倒くさがりやでさぼり魔で
自覚というものが全くない:none:none:30:100000202,ラスウェル,やはり、俺がもっと
目を光らせねばならんか。:none:100000102,レイン,……ラスウェル。
今は敵に目を光らせろよ。:none:none:None
P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000202,"Lasswell","Rain...
You are the most talented in our order.
You know this as well as I."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","But this willfulness...this apathy!
Can you not see how it reflects on you!?"|none|none|30|100000202,"Lasswell","Everything you do convinces me
I must watch you like a hawk."|none|100000102,"Rain","Could anything I do convince you to
watch our foes instead?"|none|none|None^100000202,"拉斯韋爾","雷因，你既有才華，又有實力，
本可以成為最棒的騎士……"|none|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","可你偏偏又怕麻煩、又愛偷懶，
再加上一點自覺性都沒有。"|none|none|30|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","哎，看來還是得
由我來盯著你。"|none|100000102,"雷因","……拉斯韋爾，
求你現在盯著敵人好不好。"|none|none|None^100000202,"라스웰","레인. 너는 재능으로 보나 실력으로 보나
기사들 중 으뜸인데도…"|none|100000202,"라스웰","걸핏하면 땡땡이 치고 게으름이나 피우니…
기사로서의 자각이 너무 부족하다."|none|none|30|100000202,"라스웰","아무래도 내가 좀 더
눈을 부릅뜨고 감시해야 하는 것인가?"|none|100000102,"레인","라스웰…
지금은 적이나 잘 쳐다 보라고."|none|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Rain...
Tu es le plus talentueux de notre ordre.
Tu le sais aussi bien que moi."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Mais cette obstination... cette apathie !
Ne vois-tu donc pas l'image que tu renvois ?!"|none|none|30|100000202,"Lasswell","Tout ce que tu dis et fait me convainc
de continuer à te surveiller,
par crainte des conséquences !"|none|100000102,"Rain","Et moi, comment je peux te convaincre
de rester attentif au combat ?"|none|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Rain ...
Du hast von allen in unserem Orden das größte Talent.
Das weißt du so gut wie ich."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Aber du bist so nachlässig, so phlegmatisch!
Siehst du denn nicht, was du für ein Bild abgibst?!"|none|none|30|100000202,"Lasswell","Anscheinend muss ich dir wirklich
noch genauer auf die Finger schauen,
sonst nimmt das kein gutes Ende ..."|none|100000102,"Rain","Lasswell, schau jetzt lieber
unseren Gegnern auf die Finger."|none|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Rain... Eres el mejor de nuestra orden. Lo sabes tan bien como yo."|none|100000202,"Lasswell","Pero esa cabezonería... ¡esa apatía! ¿Es que no ves cómo se refleja en ti?"|none|none|30|100000202,"Lasswell","Cada acción, cada palabra tuya me convence de que debo seguir vigilándote o sino..."|none|100000102,"Rain","¿Hay algo que pueda hacer para convencerte de que vigiles a nuestros oponentes?"|none|none|None

P_COMMAND_PARAM: 100000102,レイン,なんだか強そうなやつが出てきたぞ。:None:100000202,ラスウェル,敵の行動を見ながら気をつけて戦おう。:None:none:None
P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000102,"Rain","Maybe this one will actually put up a fight."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","We must watch our foe's movements closely...
and choose our tactics wisely."|None|none|None^100000102,"雷因","強敵出現了啊。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","戰鬥時注意看清敵人的行動！"|None|none|None^100000102,"레인","강해 보이는 놈이 나타났어."|None|100000202,"라스웰","적의 움직임을 봐 가며 신중히 움직이자!"|None|none|None^100000102,"Rain","Peut-être que celui-là se montrera plus à la hauteur."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Nous devons observer les mouvements de notre adversaire
et agir avec prudence."|None|none|None^100000102,"Rain","Der hier scheint mir irgendwie mehr Biss zu haben als die anderen."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Wir müssen den Gegner genau beobachten
und unseren nächsten Zug mit Bedacht wählen."|None|none|None^100000102,"Rain","Quizás este sea más difícil de derrotar."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Tenemos que observar sus movimientos y pelear con cabeza."|None|none|None

P_COMMAND_PARAM:
30:100000102,レイン,こいつ、攻撃すると雷で反撃してくるぞ。:None:100000202,ラスウェル,俺が魔法で攻撃してみよう。

30|100000102,"Rain","Looks like we're in for a shock
each time we hit the thing!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Then perhaps magic will better serve us.
Rain, defend yourself!"|None|100000102,"Rain","You got it!"|None|none|none|30|2,0,10000115|2,1,0|2000|None^30|100000102,"雷因","一攻擊這傢伙，牠就會用雷反擊我們。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","我來試試用魔法攻擊牠。
雷因你先做好防禦。"|None|100000102,"雷因","交給你了！"|None|none|none|30|2,0,10000115|2,1,0|2000|None^30|100000102,"레인","이 녀석…
공격하니까 번개로 반격하는데?"|None|100000202,"라스웰","내가 마법으로 공격해 보지.
레인, 넌 방어를 부탁한다."|None|100000102,"레인","그래, 부탁해!"|None|none|none|30|2,0,10000115|2,1,0|2000|None^30|100000102,"Rain","On dirait qu'on peut s'attendre à
se faire électrocuter à chaque fois qu'on le touche avec nos armes."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Dans ce cas, essayons la magie.
Rain, protège-toi !"|None|100000102,"Rain","Compris !"|None|none|none|30|2,0,10000115|2,1,0|2000|None^30|100000102,"Rain","Er beantwortet jeden Angriff
mit einem Blitzschlag!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Dann lass es uns mit Magie versuchen.
Rain, verteidige dich!"|None|100000102,"Rain","Alles klar!"|None|none|none|30|2,0,10000115|2,1,0|2000|None^30|100000102,"Rain","¡Parece que nos llevamos golpe eléctrico cada vez que atacamos!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Voy a probar con magia en vez de atacar. ¡Rain, defiéndete!"|None|100000102,"Rain","¡Dicho y hecho!"|None|none|none|30|2,0,10000115|2,1,0|2000|None

P_COMMAND_PARAM: 100000102,レイン,手強い敵だったな。:None:100000202,ラスウェル,ああ。:None:none:30:100000102,レイン,さあ、クリスタルルームに向かおう。:None:none:None
P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000102,"Rain","Phew!
That one actually made me break a sweat."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Indeed."|None|none|30|100000102,"Rain","But our path is now clear.
To the chamber of the crystal!"|None|none|None^100000102,"雷因","真是個難對付的敵人啊。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","是啊。"|None|none|30|100000102,"雷因","我們快前往水晶之間吧。"|None|none|None^100000102,"레인","만만치 않은 녀석이었어."|None|100000202,"라스웰","그래."|None|none|30|100000102,"레인","그럼, 이제 크리스탈 룸으로 가볼까?"|None|none|None^100000102,"Rain","Fiou ! Il ne s'est pas laissé faire, celui-là."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Tu l'as dit."|None|none|30|100000102,"Rain","Bon, la voie est libre maintenant.
Direction la chambre du cristal !"|None|none|None^100000102,"Rain","Puh! Der war nicht von schlechten Eltern."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Allerdings."|None|none|30|100000102,"Rain","Aber der Weg ist jetzt frei.
Auf zur Kristallkammer!"|None|none|None^100000102,"Rain","¡Fiu! Este nos ha dado trabajo."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Y que lo digas."|None|none|30|100000102,"Rain","Pero ahora el camino está libre. ¡A la cámara del cristal!"|None|none|None

P_COMMAND_PARAM:
100000202,ラスウェル,ここにもモンスターがいるのか。
面倒だな。:None:100000102,レイン,気をつけろ、ラスウェル。
こいつら狂暴化しているぞ。:None:100000202,ラスウェル,もしやクリスタルが破壊された影響か？:None:100000102,レイン,ああ。恐らくな。:None:none:None
P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000202,"Lasswell","Monsters here, too?
What a treat."|None|100000102,"Rain","Something isn't right, Lasswell.
The madness in their eyes..."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Do you think it's because of what
happened to the crystal?"|None|100000102,"Rain","That's precisely what I'm afraid of."|None|none|None^100000202,"拉斯韋爾","這裡竟然也有魔物，
真是麻煩。"|None|100000102,"雷因","拉斯韋爾，小心。
這些傢伙現在十分狂暴。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","難道跟水晶被破壞了有關？"|None|100000102,"雷因","恐怕是。"|None|none|None^100000202,"라스웰","이곳에도 마물이 있는 건가?
성가시게 됐군."|None|100000102,"레인","조심해, 라스웰. 이 녀석들…
굉장히 흉폭해."|None|100000202,"라스웰","혹시 크리스탈이 파괴되어서 그 영향을 받은 것인가?"|None|100000102,"레인","아마도… 그렇겠지?"|None|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Des monstres, ici aussi ?
Quelle veine..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Il y a quelque chose qui cloche, Lasswell.
Regarde la rage dans leurs yeux..."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Y aurait-il un rapport
avec la destruction du cristal ?"|None|100000102,"Rain","C'est bien ce qui m'inquiète."|None|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Schon wieder Monster?
Einfach großartig ..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Irgendwas stimmt hier nicht, Lasswell.
Der Wahnsinn in ihren Augen ..."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Ob das mit der Zerstörung
des Kristalls zu tun hat?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Ich fürchte es fast."|None|none|None^100000202,"Lasswell","¿Aquí también hay monstruos? Estupendo..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Algo no va bien, Lasswell. Esa locura en sus ojos..."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","¿Crees que es porque el cristal se ha hecho pedazos?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Eso me temo."|None|none|None

P_COMMAND_PARAM:
100000102,レイン,ミトラの町はまだか？:None:100000202,ラスウェル,恐らく半分くらいは
進んだところじゃないか。:None:100000102,レイン,まだ半分か。
少し疲れてきたな。:None:100000102,レイン,この戦闘が終わったら、
ラスウェル、おんぶしてくれ。:None:100000202,ラスウェル,断る。:None:none:None
P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000102,"Rain","Are we almost to Mitra?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","About halfway, by my measure."|None|100000102,"Rain","Only halfway?
My legs cry for mercy...
They can take no more!"|None|100000102,"Rain","We've no choice, Lasswell.
You're going to have to carry me
the rest of the way."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","...Or I could just leave you here."|None|none|None^100000102,"雷因","米特拉鎮怎麼還沒到啊？"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","估計還剩一半的路程。"|None|100000102,"雷因","還有一半啊，
我都有點累了。"|None|100000102,"雷因","拉斯韋爾，打完這場戰鬥，
你就背著我走吧。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","我拒絕。"|None|none|None^100000102,"레인","미트라 마을은 아직이야?"|None|100000202,"라스웰","아마 온 길 만큼
더 가야 할 거다."|None|100000102,"레인","온 길 만큼?
슬슬 지치는데…"|None|100000102,"레인","이 전투가 끝나면
라스웰, 나 좀 업어 주라."|None|100000202,"라스웰","거절하지."|None|none|None^100000102,"Rain","On arrive bientôt à Mitra ?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Nous sommes à la moitié du chemin, si je ne me trompe pas."|None|100000102,"Rain","Quoi, c'est tout ?
J'ai mal aux jambes, moi..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Tant pis, il va falloir que tu me portes
pour le restant du trajet, Lasswell."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Ou bien, je pourrais te laisser croupir ici."|None|none|None^100000102,"Rain","Sind wir bald in Mitra?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Wir haben erst die Hälfte geschafft, glaube ich."|None|100000102,"Rain","Die Hälfte?!
Ich spüre meine Beine jetzt schon nicht mehr ..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Ich fürchte, du wirst mich den Rest der Strecke
tragen müssen, Lasswell."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Oder ich lass dich einfach hier liegen."|None|none|None^100000102,"Rain","¿Estamos ya casi en Mitra?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","A medio camino, según mis cálculos."|None|100000102,"Rain","¿Sólo a medio camino? ¡Las piernas me están matando!"|None|100000102,"Rain","Vas a tener que llevarme a hombros el resto del camino, Lasswell."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","O podría dejarte tirado aquí."|None|none|None

P_COMMAND_PARAM:
100000102,レイン,くそっ！
どれだけモンスターがいるんだ！？:None:100000202,ラスウェル,レイン、しっかりしろ！:None:100000202,ラスウェル,ここで俺たちがやられたら、
死んだ兵士たちに合わせる顔がないぞ！:None:100000102,レイン,ああ。わかってる。:None:100000102,レイン,俺たちは
あいつらの分まで戦い抜かないとな。:None:none:None
P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000102,"Rain","Curses!
Is there no end to them?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Stay focused, Rain!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","If we fall here, the sacrifices of our
men will have been for naught!"|None|100000102,"Rain","I know, Lasswell...
I know."|None|100000102,"Rain","We must prevail.
For them...and for our world."|None|none|None^100000102,"雷因","可惡！
到底有多少魔物啊？！"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","雷因，堅持住！"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","要是我們在這裡被幹掉，
就太對不起死去的那些士兵了！"|None|100000102,"雷因","我明白！"|None|100000102,"雷因","我們兩個

P_COMMAND_PARAM:

P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000202,"Lasswell","Curses!
How are we supposed to get anywhere with all these distractions!?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Calm yourself, Lasswell!

to get us there any faster."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","I know...

Ahem... It won't happen again."|None|None|None^100000202,"拉斯韋爾","可惡……我們這麼著急，
可魔物還沒完沒了出來擋路！"|None|100000102,"雷因","你冷靜點，拉斯韋爾。
亂了陣腳會影響回城的速度的。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","道理我都明白，
可是……"|None|None|30|100000102,"雷因","平時不都是我負責沒頭沒腦地亂衝，

你說得沒錯。"|None|None|None^100000202,"라스웰","젠장!!

동요하면 더 도착이 늦어져."|None|100000202,"라스웰","그래, 알아.
알고는 있지만…"|None|None|30|100000102,"레인","열 받아서 달려드는 건 내 역할.

확실히 그렇긴 하군."|None|None|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Bon sang ! Comment pouvons-nous avancer

Ce n'est pas en s'énervant

Je sais, et pourtant... !"|None|None|30|100000102,"Rain","C'est moi la tête brûlée du duo, tu te rappelles ?
Toi, t'es censé être le type calme et réfléchi !"|None|None|30|100000202,"Lasswell","Certes...
Tu as raison."|None|None|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Verflucht!

Eres tú quien se supone que me tiene que frenar a mí."|None|None|30|100000202,"Lasswell","Ese era el trato, ¿no?
Ejem... No volverá a pasar."|None|None|None

until Sir Raegen came to our rescue."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","I was so happy..."|None|100000102,"Rain","You don't say?
I remember wishing the old man
would mind his own business..."|None|100000102,"Rain","But that's me.
I guess for some people, there's nothing
like seeing a friendly face."|None|100000102,"Rain","That's why we have to
go and find Fina."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","...Right. Let's do it."|None|None|None^100000202,"拉斯韋爾","正當我們嚎啕大哭時，
雷根先生就來找我們了。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","別說我那時候有多開心了。"|None|100000102,"雷因","有嗎？
我只覺得他在多管閒事。"|None|100000102,"雷因","不過，也有很多人像你一樣，
在等待著可靠的人去迎接他們……"|None|100000102,"雷因","因此我們也要
把菲娜平安接回來。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","……是啊。我明白的。"|None|None|None^100000202,"라스웰","둘이서 울상을 짓고 있으니까
레겐 님이 찾으러 와주었지."|None|100000202,"라스웰","그때는 정말로 기뻤어."|None|100000102,"레인","그런가?
나는 쓸데없는 참견이라고 생각했는데."|None|100000102,"레인","하긴… 너처럼 누군가가 데리러 오면
안심하는 사람이 있기도 하지."|None|100000102,"레인","그러니까 피나도
꼭 데리러 가 줘야 해."|None|100000202,"라스웰","그렇군… 알겠다."|None|None|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Et puis, alors que nous pensions que nous allions mourir, sire Raegen est venu à notre secours."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","J'étais si heureux..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Ah ouais ?
Moi, je trouvais qu'il se mêlait
de ce qui ne le regardait pas..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Mais bon.
Je peux comprendre la joie de voir
un visage connu quand on est perdu."|None|100000102,"Rain","C'est pour ça
qu'on doit retrouver Fina."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","C'est vrai... Allons-y."|None|None|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Da standen wir Heulsusen ...
Und plötzlich kam Sir Raegen, um uns zu holen."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Wir waren so froh ..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Du vielleicht.
Mir wär's lieber gewesen,
er hätte sich nicht eingemischt."|None|100000102,"Rain","Aber es ist wohl nicht jeder wie ich.
Manche Leute sind
auf fremde Hilfe angewiesen."|None|100000102,"Rain","Deswegen müssen wir gehen
und Fina finden."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","... Wie du meinst. Gehen wir."|None|None|None^100000202,"Lasswell","Ahí estábamos, desesperados... Y entonces Sir Raegen vino a rescatarnos."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Estaba tan contento..."|None|100000102,"Rain","¿Tú crees? Yo pensé que el viejo debería meterse en sus asuntos..."|None|100000102,"Rain","En mi caso, claro. Hay gente que daría cualquier cosa por ver una cara amable."|None|100000102,"Rain","Por eso tenemos que ir a buscar a Fina."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","...Cierto. Vamos a ello."|None|None|None

전에 이 기계를 본 기억이 있나?"|None|100000302,"피나","아, 아니.
기억은 없지만…"|None|100000302,"피나","그냥 신기해.
왠지 신경이 쓰인다… 고나 할까?"|None|None|None^100000102,"Rain","Ces machines...
Je n'ai jamais rien vu de pareil."|None|100000302,"Fina","Tiens... ?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Qu'y a-t-il, Fina ?
Tu les as déjà vues quelque part ?"|None|100000302,"Fina","N... non.
Je ne les connais pas non plus.
"|None|100000302,"Fina","Mais... c'est étrange.
Je me sens comme... attirée par elles."|None|None|None^100000102,"Rain","Diese Maschinen ...
So etwas habe ich noch nie gesehen."|None|100000302,"Fina","Diese Maschinen ..."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Was ist, Fina?
Kommen sie dir bekannt vor?"|None|100000302,"Fina","N-Nein ...
Bekannt kommen sie mir nicht vor, aber ...
"|None|100000302,"Fina","Aber irgendwas
macht mich nervös ..."|None|None|None^100000102,"Rain","Estas máquinas... Yo tampoco las he visto nunca."|None|100000302,"Fina","Pero es extraño... Me siento como... atraída hacia ellas."|None|None|None

P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000302,"Fina","Say, do you think
machines have minds
of their own?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","A sentient machine...?
I've never heard of one."|None|100000302,"Fina","Then it doesn't make sense.
Why do they keep attacking us?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Maybe they were designed that way.
By the ancients."|None|100000302,"Fina","...I see.
That seems sad, somehow.
Don't you think?"|None|None|None^100000302,"菲娜","機械有心嗎？"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","唔，
我是沒有聽說過機械擁有心。"|None|100000302,"菲娜","那這些機械
為什麼要攻擊我們呢？"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","因為古代人就是
這樣設計它們的。"|None|100000302,"菲娜","……這樣啊，
總覺得機械真可憐。"|None|None|None^100000302,"피나","저기~, 기계는 마음이 없어?"|None|100000202,"라스웰","글쎄다.
기계에 마음이 있다는 말은 들어 본 적 없다."|None|100000302,"피나","그럼 여기에 있는 기계는
왜 우리를 공격하는 거야?"|None|100000202,"라스웰","그렇게 움직이도록 만들어졌겠지.
고대인들에 의해서 말이다."|None|100000302,"피나","그렇구나.
기계라는 존재는 어딘지 불쌍하네…"|None|None|None^100000302,"Fina","Dis,
tu crois que les machines
peuvent penser ?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Je n'ai jamais rien entendu
de semblable."|None|100000302,"Fina","Mais alors, pourquoi
elles n'arrêtent pas de nous attaquer ?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Peut-être qu'elles ont été conçues dans ce but.
Par les anciens."|None|100000302,"Fina","Je vois...
C'est plutôt... triste,
tu ne trouves pas ?"|None|None|None^100000302,"Fina","Sagt mal ...
Haben Maschinen
keine Seelen?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Hm. Ich hab noch nie von einer Maschine
mit einer Seele gehört."|None|100000302,"Fina","Aber wenn das so ist ...
Warum greifen uns die Maschinen dann an?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Vielleicht wurden sie einfach so gebaut.
Von den Menschen der Vorzeit."|None|100000302,"Fina","Hm, verstehe ...
Das ist doch irgendwie traurig, oder?
Die armen Maschinen ..."|None|None|None^100000302,"Fina","Dime, ¿crees que las máquinas tienen pensamiento propio?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Nunca he oído hablar de una máquina con pensamiento."|None|100000302,"Fina","Entonces no tiene sentido. ¿Por qué no paran de atacarnos?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","A lo mejor fueron diseñadas así. Por los antiguos."|None|100000302,"Fina","...Ya veo. Es un poco... triste. ¿No crees?"|None|None|None

100000102,"Rain","We're almost to the core."|None|100000302,"Fina","I feel it again...his presence.

J'ai peur…"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Reste forte, Fina.
La peur mène à l'imprudence,

On te protègera... quoi qu'il arrive."|None|100000302,"Fina","Merci... merci, mes amis !"|None|None|None^100000102,"Rain","Wir haben fast das Herz des Schreins erreicht."|None|100000302,"Fina","Ich kann diesen Kerl wieder spüren ...
Ich hab Angst!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Sei standhaft, Fina.
Furcht führt zu Unaufmerksamkeit.

Egal was kommt, wir beschützen dich."|None|100000302,"Fina","Danke, meine Freunde!"|None|None|None^100000102,"Rain","Ya casi estamos en el fondo."|None|100000302,"Fina","La noto otra vez... Su presencia. Tengo mucho miedo..."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Sé fuerte, Fina. El miedo lleva al descuido... y el descuido, a la muerte."|None|100000102,"Rain","No hay por qué temer, Fina. 真是意外。",1|None|100000703,"傑科","竟然說意外……

신경 쓸 필요 없어.",1|None|100006703,"일즈","생각보다 섬세하시군요.

Tu n'as pas à t'en soucier.",1|None|100006703,"Ilias","Vous êtes bien plus fin que je ne l'imaginais, Jake.",1|None|100000703,"Jake","Bien plus que tu ne l'imaginais... Si je m'attendais à me faire insulter... Je te retourne le compliment, Ilias."|None|100006703,"Ilias","Hein ? P-Pardon ! Ce n'est pas ce que je voulais dire !",1|None|None|None^100000703,"Jake","... Es ist etwas unangenehm, nicht wahr?"|None|100006703,"Ilias","Was genau?",1|None|100000703,"Jake","Vor kurzer Zeit war ich noch Teil der Rebellen, und damit euer Feind."|None|100006804,"Fohlen","Deine Handlungen sprechen Bände über deine Gefühle für Zooldad.",1|None|100006804,"Fohlen","Darum sind wir hier. 100012005,"Jake","Hey, Lasswell. Can I ask you something about Rain?"|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Sure. I'll answer any question it is you have about him."|None|100012005,"Jake","Was Rain into the ladies?"|None|100012005,"Jake","After joining you, I didn't really get that impression of him."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","...W-well. He definitely did."|None|None|None^100012005,"傑科","喂，拉斯韋爾。
我想問你關於雷因的事。"|None|100011705,"拉斯韋爾","好。
儘管問吧。"|None|100012005,"傑科","聽說雷因好色，是不是真的？"|None|100012005,"傑科","我成為夥伴的時候，
沒感覺他是那樣的人。"|None|100011705,"拉斯韋爾","……啊啊。
……他的確有這個毛病。"|None|None|None^100012005,"제이크","저기, 라스웰.
레인에 대해서 뭐 좀 물어봐도 돼?"|None|100011705,"라스웰","그래.
레인에 대해서라면 뭐든지."|None|100012005,"제이크","레인 말야, 여자를 밝혔던가?"|None|100012005,"제이크","우리가 동료가 되었을 때는
그런 것 같지 않았었는데."|None|100011705,"라스웰","……그, 그렇지.
……분명 그런 점도 있었다만."|None|None|None^100012005,"Jake","Hé, Lasswell. Je peux te poser une question au sujet de Rain ?"|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Bien sûr. Qu'est-ce que tu veux savoir ?"|None|100012005,"Jake","Est-ce que qu'il aimait vraiment les femmes ?"|None|100012005,"Jake","Même après vous avoir rejoint, j'ai jamais vraiment eu l'impression que c'était le cas."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","...Eh bien, je peux te dire qu'il aimait vraiment les femmes."|None|None|None^100012005,"Jake","He, Lasswell. Kann ich dich etwas zu Rain fragen?"|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Sicher. Ich werde dir jede Frage beantworten."|None|100012005,"Jake","Steht Rain auf Frauen?"|None|100012005,"Jake","Ich hatte nicht wirklich diesen Eindruck."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","... A-also. Doch, das tut er."|None|None|None^100012005,"Jake","Oye, Lasswell. ¿Puedo preguntarte algo sobre Rain?"|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Claro. Adelante, cuéntame."|None|100012005,"Jake","¿Rain era aficionado a las mujeres?"|None|100012005,"Jake","Cuando me uní a vosotros, nunca me dio esa sensación."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","... B-bueno. La verdad es que sí lo es."|None|None|None

分明只是一個普通的獵場。",1|None|100012605,"庫西拉","可是，自從被劃定為禁忌之地後，
包括我在內，沒有人靠近過。",1|None|100011705,"拉斯韋爾","禁忌之地裡究竟有什麼？"|None|None|None^100012505,"니콜","어째서 야슈카 왕은 백성들의 사냥터를
금단의 땅으로 정한 걸까요.",1|None|100012605,"쿤시라","모르겠습니다……
초록이 울창한 평범한 사냥터인데……",1|None|100012605,"쿤시라","금단의 땅이 되어버리고 나서부턴
저는 물론, 그 누구도 다가갈 수 없어요.",1|None|100011705,"라스웰","대체 금단의 땅엔 무엇이 있는 거지……"|None|None|None^100012505,"Nichol","Je me demande bien pourquoi le roi Yashka a décrété que le terrain de chasse de ses sujets devait devenir une zone interdite.",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée... Cette zone ressemble à un terrain de chasse classique pourtant, recouvert par la nature...",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Mais, elle a pourtant été déclarée zone interdite, donc personne, pas même nous ne peut rester en ces lieux.",1|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Qu'est-ce qui peut bien nous attendre là-bas..."|None|None|None^100012505,"Nichol","Warum König Yashka das Jagdgebiet seines Volkes wohl zur verbotenen Zone erklärt hat?",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Ich weiß es nicht ... 100012505,"Nichol","There's one more thing that's on my mind, and that's the peace agreement the King entered into on his own accord.",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","The King did this as a first step towards peace among the tribes, right?",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Though renowned as a step towards peace, there is a long history of friction between the tribes...",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","I guess it can't be summed up so easily.",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Yes.",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","Then why was the King in such a rush to see this agreement through, I wonder?",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","I do not know. However, surely there is a reason.",1|None|None|None^100012505,"尼科爾","還有一件很奇怪的事。
就是國王單方面決斷的共存協定。",1|None|100012505,"尼科爾","為種族間的和平邁出的第一步。
國王決心走這條路。",1|None|100012605,"庫西拉","和平之道只是表面上的。
種族間的對立從未消失過……",1|None|100012505,"尼科爾","也就是說，事情並沒有那麼簡單。",1|None|100012605,"庫西拉","是。",1|None|100012505,"尼科爾","既然如此，為什麼國王
這麼著急推動協議呢？",1|None|100012605,"庫西拉","不知道。
不過，肯定有特別的理由才是。",1|None|None|None^100012505,"니콜","신경 쓰이는 점이 또 하나 있습니다.
왕이 단독으로 결정한 공존 협정입니다.",1|None|100012505,"니콜","종족간의 평화를 향한 첫걸음.
왕은 그 길로 나아가려 하는 건가요?",1|None|100012605,"쿤시라","평화의 길이라는 게 듣기에는 좋지만,
종족간의 대립은 하루 이틀 일이 아니니까요……",1|None|100012505,"니콜","그렇게 간단히 정리될 문제가 아니라는 말씀이군요.",1|None|100012605,"쿤시라","네.",1|None|100012505,"니콜","그렇다면 왕은 어째서 그렇게 서둘러
협정을 맺으려 했던 걸까요……",1|None|100012605,"쿤시라","모르겠습니다.
하지만, 반드시 무언가 이유가 있을 거예요.",1|None|None|None^100012505,"Nichol","Cela me fait penser... L'accord de paix qu'a conclu le roi...",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","... Il a fait ça pour engager des négociations qui pourraient déboucher sur une paix durable entre les tribus, n'est-ce pas ?",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Même si je reconnais qu'il a essayé de faire le premier pas, nos tribus ont un histoire émaillée de conflits depuis des centaines d'années.",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","Et j'imagine que cela ne se règle pas en un coup de baguette magique.",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Oui.",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","Alors pourquoi le roi a-t-il fait signer cet accord dans la précipitation... C'est étrange.",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Je n'en ai aucune idée. Mais il y a sûrement une raison.",1|None|None|None^100012505,"Nichol","Es gibt noch etwas, das ich auf dem Herzen habe: Es ist das Friedensabkommen, das der König auf eigene Faust eingegangen ist.",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","Der König hat das als ersten Schritt in Richtung eines Friedens zwischen den Stämmen getan, oder?",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","In Richtung Frieden klingt zwar schön,
aber die Reibung zwischen den Stämmen dauert schon so lange an ...",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","Ich glaube das ist einfacher gesagt, als getan.",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Ja.",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","Aber warum war dem König so daran gelegen, das Abkommen schnell zu verwirklichen?",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Ich weiß es nicht. Ich bin mir sicher, es wird einen guten Grund haben.",1|None|None|None^100012505,"Nichol","Hay una cosa más que me ronda la cabeza: el acuerdo de paz que el rey quería promulgar.",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","El rey hizo esto como primer paso hacia la paz entre las tribus, ¿verdad?",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Aunque fue un paso muy ovacionado hacia la paz, las tribus llevan batallando entre sí demasiado tiempo.",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","Me imagino que es no se trata de un tema de fácil resolución.",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","Sí.",1|None|100012505,"Nichol","Entonces, ¿por qué tenía el rey tanta prisa en llegar a un acuerdo?",1|None|100012605,"Kunshira","No tengo ni idea. Pero tiene que haber algún motivo.",1|None|None|None

P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100005500,"Citra","Despite being a human, it seems King Palte is supporting the beasts.",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","To have been received as king by a different race, I think he will do well to foster peace with Natura, as well.",1|None|100009900,"Folka","That's right. Given any sort of catalyst...",1|None|100009800,"Cid","I believe that catalyst this time was the peace agreement.",1|None|100009900,"Folka","When you think of it that way, it makes it even harder to forgive.",1|None|None|None^100005500,"希特拉","巴爾特王身為人類，
卻深受獸人愛戴啊。",1|None|100010000,"伊格尼西奧","如果有選別的種族作為國王的器量，
相信和納特拉也能相處得很好吧。",1|None|100009900,"芙爾卡","是啊，
要是有合適的契機就好了。",1|None|100009800,"希德","那個契機，
應該就是這次的共存協定吧。",1|None|100009900,"芙爾卡","這次的恐怖襲擊
真是不可原諒。",1|None|None|None^100005500,"시트라","파르테 왕은 인간이면서도
수인들의 지지를 얻고 있는 것 같군.",1|None|100010000,"이그니시오","타종족을 왕으로 선택할 정도의 수용력이라면
나투라와도 우호적으로 지낼 수 있을 텐데 말이야.",1|None|100009900,"폴카","그렇군요.
뭔가 계기만 있으면……",1|None|100009800,"시드","그 계기가 이번
공존 협정이었겠지.",1|None|100009900,"폴카","그렇게 생각하면, 이번 테러는
더더욱 용서할 수 없군요.",1|None|None|None^100005500,"Citra","Il semble que le roi Palté soutienne les bêtes. C'est un humain pourtant.",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Si les Natura le reçoive chez eux en le reconnaissant comme roi d'une autre tribu, je pense qu'il fait bien de chercher à s'allier avec eux.",1|None|100009900,"Folka","C'est vrai. Quel qu'en soit le vecteur.",1|None|100009800,"Cid","Et je pense que le vecteur est cette fois l'accord de paix.",1|None|100009900,"Folka","C'est d'autant plus difficile à pardonner, lorsqu'on l'envisage sous cet angle.",1|None|None|None^100005500,"Citra","Es scheint, als würde König Palte die Bestien unterstützen, obwohl er ein Mensch ist.",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Von einer anderen Rasse als König empfangen zu werden, bedeutet wohl auch, dass auch die Natura sich gut mit ihm verstehen werden.",1|None|100009900,"Folka","So ist es.
Wenn es nur einen Auslöser dafür gäbe...",1|None|100009800,"Cid","Ich denke, dass der Auslöser dafür, das Friedensabkommen war.",1|None|100009900,"Folka","Wenn man das so sieht, ist die Sache umso unverzeihlicher.",1|None|None|None^100005500,"Citra","A pesar de ser humano, parece que le rey Palte está ayudando a las bestias.",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Para que otra especie lo reciba como a un rey, creo que también le interesa promover la paz con los natura.",1|None|100009900,"Folka","Así es. Viendo el tipo de catalizador...",1|None|100009800,"Cid","Creo que el acuerdo de paz fue el catalizador esta vez.",1|None|100009900,"Folka","Si lo piensas de esa manera, es aún más difícil de perdonar.",1|None|None|None

불쾌하기까지 한 추리다.",1|None|100009900,"폴카","정말이지 답 없는 나르시시스트로군요.",1|None|100010100,"지크하르트","훗.
또 한방 먹었군……",1|None|None|None^100010100,"Sieghard","Un criminel laid... Alors ? Que dis-tu de mon travail de détective ?",1|None|100005500,"Citra","... J'ai du mal à croire que je vais dire ça, mais à quoi cela peut bien nous avancer de savoir qui a fait ça ?",1|None|100010100,"Sieghard","Seul un esprit aussi brillant que le mien aurait pu arriver à une si belle conclusion.",1|None|100005500,"Citra","C'est non seulement inutile, mais ton résonnement ne tient absolument pas la route.",1|None|100009900,"Folka","Tu n'es vraiment rien d'autre qu'un narcissique qui ne s'intéresse à rien d'autre qu'à lui-même",1|None|100010100,"Sieghard","Mhmm. Pourquoi suis-je toujours obligé d'être traité comme ça ?",1|None|None|None^100010100,"Sieghard","Der Täter ist also nach Adam Riese ein hässlicher Mensch ...
Was hältst du von meiner Detektivarbeit?",1|None|100005500,"Citra","... Nur durch meine geniale und elegante Einsicht konnte ich überhaupt erst zu einer so wunderschönen Schlussfolgerung gelangen.",1|None|100005500,"Citra","Sie ist nicht nur überhaupt nicht hilfreich,

100010005,"Raegen","What worries me is that someone has to be employing these two."|None|100010000,"Ignacio","What about that concerns you?",1|None|100010005,"Raegen","If that employer has no connection with the Natura tribe, then..."|None|100010000,"Ignacio","If they've no relation... Then what?",1|None|100010005,"Raegen","That would mean that the Shibyra would have no reason to fight the Natura."|None|100010000,"Ignacio","I see! Now that you put it that way, I understand!",1|None|None|None^100010005,"雷根","讓人在意的是，
那兩個人是受人僱傭的。"|None|100010000,"伊格尼西奧","這有什麼可在意的？",1|None|100010005,"雷根","如果僱主
和納特拉族無關的話……"|None|100010000,"伊格尼西奧","無關的話……會怎樣？",1|None|100010005,"雷根","西維拉族就沒有了
向納特拉族發動戰爭的理由了。"|None|100010000,"伊格尼西奧","原來是這樣啊！
你這樣說我就明白了！",1|None|None|None^100010005,"레겐","신경 쓰이는 건
그 둘을 고용한 자가 있다는 거다."|None|100010000,"이그니시오","그게 왜 신경 쓰이는데?",1|None|100010005,"레겐","혹여, 그 고용주가
나투라 족과 관계가 없다면……"|None|100010000,"이그니시오","관계가 없다면…… 어떻게 되는데?",1|None|100010005,"레겐","시빌라 족에게는 나투라 족과
전쟁을 벌일 이유가 없어지는 거다."|None|100010000,"이그니시오","과연, 그렇게 되는군!
나도 이제 알겠다!",1|None|None|None^100010005,"Raegen","Ce qui m'inquiète le plus c'est que quelqu'un ait employé ces deux-là"|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Qu'est-ce qui te dérange ?",1|None|100010005,"Raegen","Si cet employeur n'a aucun lien avec les Natura alors..."|None|100010000,"Ignacio","S'ils n'ont aucun lien alors... quoi ?",1|None|100010005,"Raegen","Cela voudrait dire que les Shibyra n'auraient aucune raison de combattre les Natura."|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Je vois ! Maintenant que tu le mets sous cet angle, je comprends mieux.",1|None|None|None^100010005,"Raegen","Mir bereitet vor allem Sorgen, dass
die zwei wohl einen Auftraggeber hatten."|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Was genau sorgt dich daran?",1|None|100010005,"Raegen","Sollte dieser Auftraggeber keine Beziehung zu den Natura haben, dann ..."|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Wenn sie nichts miteinander zu tun haben, ... dann was?",1|None|100010005,"Raegen","Das würde bedeuten, dass die Shibyra keinen Grund dazu hätten, mit den Natura zu kämpfen."|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Ah, so meinst du das!
Wenn du es so sagst, verstehe ich es aus!",1|None|None|None^100010005,"Raegen","Lo que a mí me preocupa es que hay alguien que tiene que estar contratando a estos dos."|None|100010000,"Ignacio","¿Y qué es lo que te preocupa de eso?",1|None|100010005,"Raegen","Si el empleador no tiene ninguna conexión con la tribu de los natura, entonces..."|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Si no tienen ninguna relación... ¿Entonces qué?",1|None|100010005,"Raegen","Significaría que los shibyra no tendrían ningún motivo para luchar contra los natura."|None|100010000,"Ignacio","¡Ya veo! Ahora que lo dices así, ¡vaya que sí!",1|None|None|None

100010005,"Raegen","Given he is Natura warrior, surely there has to be something going on."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Yes."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Natura has lost the power of the crystal, and their land is being reduced to a desert."|None|100010005,"Raegen","What's that?"|None|100011705,"Lasswell","That's why for Natura to survive, they need Shibyra's techniques."|None|100010005,"Raegen","In other words, this isn't the time for them to be at war."|None|None|None^100010005,"雷根","既然他是納特拉的戰士，
肯定是有隱情的。"|None|100011705,"拉斯韋爾","是。"|None|100011705,"拉斯韋爾","納特拉失去了水晶之力，
導致了土地不斷沙漠化。"|None|100010005,"雷根","什麼？"|None|100011705,"拉斯韋爾","所以，為了生存，
納特拉必須獲得西維拉的技術。"|None|100010005,"雷根","看來現在真的不是打仗的時候。"|None|None|None^100010005,"레겐","네가 나투라의 전사가 된 건
뭔가 사정이 있는 거겠지."|None|100011705,"라스웰","네."|None|100011705,"라스웰","나투라는 크리스탈의 힘을 잃고,
대지가 사막화하고 있습니다."|None|100010005,"레겐","뭐라고?"|None|100011705,"라스웰","그래서, 나투라가 살아남기 위해서는
시빌라의 기술이 필요합니다."|None|100010005,"레겐","역시 전쟁 같은 걸 하고 있을 상황이 아니군."|None|None|None^100010005,"Raegen","Vu que la victime était un guerrier Natura, il y a de fortes chances que tout ça cache quelque chose."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Oui."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Les Natura ont perdu le pouvoir du cristal et leurs terres ne sont plus qu'un immense désert."|None|100010005,"Raegen","Que dis-tu ?"|None|100011705,"Lasswell","C'est pourquoi les Natura ont besoin des techniques des Shibyra : pour survivre."|None|100010005,"Raegen","Autrement dit, ce n'est absolument pas dans leur intérêt de faire la guerre."|None|None|None^100010005,"Raegen","Wenn man bedenkt, dass er ein Natura-Krieger war,
wird es sicherlich irgendeine Bewandnis damit haben."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Ja."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Natura hat die Kraft seines Kristalles verloren
und ihr Land verwandelt sich immer mehr in eine Wüste."|None|100010005,"Raegen","Was?"|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Um ihr eigenes Überleben zu sichern, brauchen die Natura also die Technologie der Shibyra."|None|100010005,"Raegen","Anders gesagt: Dies ist gar nicht der richtige Augenblick für sie, einen Krieg zu führen."|None|None|None^100010005,"Raegen","Como es un guerrero de los natura, seguro que está pasando algo."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Sí."|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Los natura han perdido el poder del cristal y sus tierras se están convirtiendo en un desierto."|None|100010005,"Raegen","¿Cómo?"|None|100011705,"Lasswell","Por eso, para que los natura sobrevivan, necesitan las técnicas de los shibyra."|None|100010005,"Raegen","En definitiva, tienen cosas más importantes que hacer que enzarzarse en una guerra."|None|None|None

관심 없어.",1|None|100010100,"지크하르트","그렇군.

Force est d'admettre qu'il est persévérant.",1|None|None|None^100010100,"Sieghard","Raegen hatte ein schweres Leben, aber auch meine so prunkvolle Geschichte hat es in sich.",1|None|100010100,"Sieghard","Also gut. 0,"Delulu","Zolulu, what should we do? Should we take out that frozen old lady first?"|None|0,"Zolulu","That's a good idea, Delulu. Mieux vaut se débarrasser des plus faibles en premier."|None|100005500,"Citra","Ces moins que rien. Que tout le monde protège Yuraisha.",1|None|0,"Delulu","Ah ha ha ! P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100010000,"Ignacio","Why is Raegen so cold to Yuraisha?",1|None|100010100,"Sieghard","They were enemies during the war of independence. One can't suddenly become friendly after that.",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Still... You'd think they'd be at least a bit happier to be reunited, right?",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","That would depend on how they feel toward each other... It must be hard, being in front of us all.",1|None|None|None^100010000,"伊格尼西奧","雷根為什麼
對尤萊莎那麼見外啊？",1|None|100010100,"吉克哈特","獨立戰爭時期他們可是敵人，
不可能一下子關係變好吧？",1|None|100010000,"伊格尼西奧","話雖這麼說……
但能夠再會，他還是很高興的吧？",1|None|100010000,"伊格尼西奧","表現出來不就好了……
還是說在我們面前害羞？",1|None|None|None^100010000,"이그니시오","레겐은 어째서
유라이샤에게 쌀쌀맞게 구는 거지?",1|None|100010100,"지크하르트","독립 전쟁 때 적대하던 사이였으니,
갑자기 사이좋게 지내는 것도 껄끄럽겠지.",1|None|100010000,"이그니시오","그렇긴 해도……
다시 만나서 기쁜 건 사실이잖아?",1|None|100010000,"이그니시오","좀 더 솔직해져도 될 텐데……
우리들 앞이라 쑥스러운 건가?",1|None|None|None^100010000,"Ignacio","Pourquoi Raegen est-il si froid envers Yuraisha ?",1|None|100010100,"Sieghard","Ils étaient ennemis pendant la guerre d'indépendance. Difficile de se lier d'amitié après ça.",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Quand même... Ils pourraient être un peu plus heureux de se revoir, tu ne penses pas ?",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Tout dépend des sentiments qu'ils ont l'un pour l'autre... Ça doit être difficile de se retrouver comme ça, devant nous tous.",1|None|None|None^100010000,"Ignacio","Wieso ist Raegen so kalt zu Yuraisha?",1|None|100010100,"Sieghard","Sie waren Gegner während des Unabhängigkeitskrieges. So plötzlich freundet sich danach niemand an.",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Trotzdem ... Aber über ein Wiedersehen freut sich doch jeder, oder etwa nicht?",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Ein wenig zutraulicher hätten sie schon sein können ... Vielleicht schämen sie sich vor uns.",1|None|None|None^100010000,"Ignacio","¿Por qué tiene Raegen tanto frío, Yuraisha?",1|None|100010100,"Sieghard","Durante la guerra de independencia, eran enemigos. Y las hostilidades no se acaban tan fácilmente.",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Aun así... Lo más normal sería pensar que se alegrarían de reunirse, ¿no?",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Eso depende de cómo se sientan entre sí... Estar frente a todos nosotros tiene que ser difícil.",1|None|None|None

그런 문제는 아니겠지……",1|None|None|None^100009800,"Cid","La relation entre parent et enfant est dénuée de toute raison.",1|None|100009800,"Cid","Je ne doute pas que Raegen et Yuraisha soient heureux d'être réunis.",1|None|100009800,"Cid","C'est pour cette raison qu'il est difficile de comprendre tout ceci, après tout ce qu'il s'est passé jusqu'à maintenant.",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Je vois...",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Ce n'est pas comme s'ils pouvaient simplement régler ça avec un sourire...",1|None|None|None^100009800,"Cid","Die Bande zwischen Eltern und ihren Kindern sind unbegreiflich.",1|None|100009800,"Cid","Ich bin mir sicher, dass sie Freude über ihre Zusammenkunft verspüren.",1|None|100009800,"Cid","Deswegen ist es so schwer zu verstehen; nach allem was bisher passiert ist.",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Ich verstehe ...",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Mit einer Umarmung ist es hier nicht getan ...",1|None|None|None^100009800,"Cid","Ya, pero la relación padre-hijo es la relación padre-hijo.",1|None|100009800,"Cid","Seguro que Raegen y Yuraisha están contentos de volverse a ver.",1|None|100009800,"Cid","Por eso es tan difícil de entender si se tiene en cuenta todo lo que ha pasado hasta ahora.",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","Entiendo...",1|None|100010000,"Ignacio","No es algo que se arregla con un simple abrazo...",1|None|None|None

目の前にいるのは幻だけど。:None:100000403,ニコル,古い歴史の文献にあります。
すべてを滅ぼす閃光の源は……:None:100000403,ニコル,……あらゆる時空から、力を

P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000403,"Nichol","What if... What if this esper is making these visions of itself on its own!?"|None|100000403,"Nichol","I would think an esper capable of surpassing time and manifesting itself would be capable of shaping the future..."|None|100000102,"Rain","An esper...right? However, what we're facing is a mere phantom."|None|100000403,"Nichol","It is written of in old texts. The source of the flash that destroys all..."|None|100000403,"Nichol","It draws power from multiple dimensions, endlessly."|None|100000503,"Lid","H-hey now! How can you talk about total destruction so calmly!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Indeed, we can't allow this thing to wander freely."|None|none|none^100000403,"尼科爾","這幻獸……
難道是自己在產生幻影？"|None|100000403,"尼科爾","超越時空、展現身形的幻獸，
我一直以為是後世創作出來的故事……"|None|100000102,"雷因","牠真的是幻獸吧……
雖然眼前的只是幻影。"|None|100000403,"尼科爾","古代歷史文獻中也有記載。
摧毀萬物的閃光之源……"|None|100000403,"尼科爾","……通過從各個時空聚集力量，
成為了無限。"|None|100000503,"里德","等等！摧毀萬物？
別說得那麼輕鬆啊！"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","是啊。
絕不能放任這傢伙肆虐！"|None|none|none^100000403,"니콜","설마… 이 환수…
스스로 환영을 만들어내고 있는 건가?"|None|100000403,"니콜","시공을 초월해 모습을 드러내는 환수는 후세 사람들이
만들어낸 이야기라고 생각해왔습니다…"|None|100000102,"레인","환수… 맞지?
눈앞에 있는 저건 환영이지만."|None|100000403,"니콜","옛 역사 문헌에는 이리 기록되어 있습니다.
만물을 멸하는 섬광의 근원은…"|None|100000403,"니콜","…모든 시공으로부터 힘을
끌어모아 무한해질 것이라고."|None|100000503,"리드","잠깐!
멸하니 어쩌니, 말 한번 쉽게 하네!"|None|100000202,"라스웰","그래, 아무래도 이 녀석은
내버려 둬선 안 되겠군!"|None|none|none^100000403,"Nichol","Et si... Et si cette chimère créait ses visions elle-même !?"|None|100000403,"Nichol","Il est possible qu'une chimère capable de s'affranchir de l'espace-temps soit aussi capable de fabriquer le futur..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Oui, une chimère d'accord, mais là ce n'est qu'un simple fantôme."|None|100000403,"Nichol","C'est écrit dans les textes anciens. La source de l'éclair qui détruisit tout..."|None|100000403,"Nichol","Elle rassemble du pouvoir à travers l'espace et le temps indéfiniment."|None|100000503,"Lid","Attends une seconde ! Comment tu peux parler de destruction aussi calmement !"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Oui, cette chose est trop dangereuse pour qu'on la laisse en vie."|None|none|none^100000403,"Nichol","Was ... was, wenn dieser Esper diese Visionen selbst macht?"|None|100000403,"Nichol","Ein Esper, der die Zeit überdauert und sich manifestiert, könnte die Zukunft formen ..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Ein Esper ... oder? Aber vor uns ist nur ein Phantom."|None|100000403,"Nichol","Es steht in den alten Schriften. Die Quelle des Blitzes, die uns alle vernichtet ..."|None|100000403,"Nichol","Sie sammelt Kraft aus den unterschiedlichen Raumzeiten, es ist endlos."|None|100000503,"Lid","Warte! Wie kannst du so leicht von „vernichten“ reden!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Ja, wir können diesen Typen nicht einfach hier lassen."|None|none|none^100000403,"Nichol","¿Y si... este esper estuviera creando estas visiones de si mismo?"|None|100000403,"Nichol","Diría que un esper capaz de viajar en el tiempo y aparecerse podría incluso cambiar el futuro..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Un esper, ¿no? Pero aquí tenemos a una mera sombra de él."|None|100000403,"Nichol","Los escritos antiguos hablan de algo que origina un fulgor que lo destruye todo..."|None|100000403,"Nichol","Y que atrae su poder de múltiples dimensiones y de manera infinita."|None|100000503,"Lid","¡O-oye! ¡Cómo puedes hablar de destrucción así sin inmutarte!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Ciertamente, no podemos permitir que esta cosa ande suelta."|None|none|none

100000703,"Jake","So this lay asleep below the empire for this long, huh?"|None|100000403,"Nichol","Was it not spoken of in your history or folklore?"|None|100000703,"Jake","Sorry, but I'm not so big on history lessons."|None|100000703,"Jake","Besides, once the emperor became a despot, most of our historical documents were restricted."|None|100000703,"Jake","All records of war were burnt, like the ones I used to read as a child."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Destroying a questionable past... P_COMMAND_PARAM:
100007705,常闇のヴェリアス,……ほう、お前たちか。
まさかこの場所で会うとはな。:None:100000102,レイン,意外だったか？:None:100000102,レイン,結構、簡単だったぜ。
お前の足跡を追うのなんてな。:None:100007705,常闇のヴェリアス,……フッ。
虫けらの追跡など誰が気にするか。:None:100000202,ラスウェル,その手に持っているもの……。
それがお前の目的だったというわけか。:None:100007705,常闇のヴェリアス,それを知ったところで、
どの道、お前たちはここで死ぬ運命だ。:None:100000302,フィーナ,私たちは死なないもん！
逆にあなたをやっつけてやるんだから！:None:100007705,常闇のヴェリアス,せめて安らかに眠らせてやろう。
我が闇の中で…永遠にな！:None:100000102,レイン,ラスウェル、フィーナ！
くるぞ！:None:None:305011000:None
P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100007705,"Veritas of the Dark","...You riff-raff again.
Weren't you supposed to be...dead?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Surprised to see us?
Don't be."|None|100000102,"Rain","Tracking you here to the ruins
was a piece of cake."|None|100007705,"Veritas of the Dark","Hmph.
Spare me your pitiful boasting, worm."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","There...in your hand.
That's what you've been searching for."|None|100007705,"Veritas of the Dark","What insight.
One so clever must also have realized...
that this is where you die."|None|100000302,"Fina","Hah!
If anyone's going to die here, it's you!"|None|100007705,"Veritas of the Dark","It's past your bedtime, little girl. Sleep, now, a dreamless sleep, blanketed in darkness... For all eternity!"|None|100000102,"Rain","Lasswell, Fina!
Here he comes!"|None|None|305011000|None^100007705,"常暗之維利亞斯","哼，原來是你們啊。
沒想到我們又見面了。"|None|100000102,"雷因","你感到很意外嗎？"|None|100000102,"雷因","要找到你可是很簡單的。"|None|100007705,"常暗之維利亞斯","……哼。
誰會去在意身後的幾隻小蟲子呢。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","你手上的東西……
這就是你的目的嗎？"|None|100007705,"常暗之維利亞斯","知道這些也沒用，
反正你們就要死在這裡了。"|None|100000302,"菲娜","我們是不會死的！
會死的是你才對！"|None|100007705,"常暗之維利亞斯","就讓你們在我的黑暗中……
永遠安眠吧！"|None|100000102,"雷因","拉斯韋爾、菲娜！
小心！"|None|None|305011000|None^100007705,"영원한 어둠의 베리어스","……호오, 너희로군……
설마 이 곳에서 만날 줄이야!"|None|100000102,"레인","뜻밖인가 보지?"|None|100000102,"레인","네 뒤를 밟는 일 쯤은 식은 죽 먹기라고!"|None|100007705,"영원한 어둠의 베리어스","……훗,
네놈들의 추적 따위 신경 쓸 가치가 있을 리가."|None|100000202,"라스웰","지금 네 손에 들고 있는 바로 그것!
그게 네 목적이었나?"|None|100007705,"영원한 어둠의 베리어스","그걸 알아 봤자
어차피 너희는 여기서 죽을 운명이다."|None|100000302,"피나","우리는 죽지 않아!
오히려 여기서 끝나는 것은 당신이라고!"|None|100007705,"영원한 어둠의 베리어스","편히 잠들게 해주마.
나의 어둠 속에서 말이다…
영원히!!!"|None|100000102,"레인","라스웰, 피나!
온다!"|None|None|305011000|None^100007705,"Veritas des Ténèbres","Encore vous...
N'étiez-vous pas censés être morts ?"|None|100000102,"Rain","On est pleins de surprises,
figure-toi."|None|100000102,"Rain","C'était pas bien compliqué
de suivre ta trace jusqu'aux ruines."|None|100007705,"Veritas des Ténèbres","Hmpf.
Épargne-moi tes fanfaronnades, sale insecte."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Ce que tu as dans la main...
C'est ce que tu recherchais, n'est-ce pas ?"|None|100007705,"Veritas des Ténèbres","Quel esprit de déduction...
Mais si tu crois que ça vous sauvera la vie, tu te trompes !"|None|100000302,"Fina","Pff !
Si quelqu'un doit mourir, c'est toi !"|None|100007705,"Veritas des Ténèbres","C'est l'heure de dormir, petite !
Abandonne-toi aux ténèbres... pour l'éternité !"|None|100000102,"Rain","Lasswell, Fina !
Attention !"|None|None|305011000|None^100007705,"Veritas der Finstere","... Oha, ihr schon wieder.
Wer hätte gedacht, dass wir uns an diesem Ort wiedersehen ..."|None|100000102,"Rain","Bist du überrascht?
"|None|100000102,"Rain","Es war eigentlich nichts dabei.
Deine Fährte war ja kaum zu übersehen."|None|100007705,"Veritas der Finstere","Pah. Als ob es mich kümmerte,
welche Würmer meiner Fährte folgen."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Darauf hast du es also abgesehen.
Das Ding in deiner Hand."|None|100007705,"Veritas der Finstere","Gut beobachtet. Allerdings werdet ihr dieses Wissen
unweigerlich mit in euer Grab nehmen."|None|100000302,"Fina","Wir nehmen gar nichts mit ins Grab!
Wenn hier einer was mit ins Grab nimmt, dann du!"|None|100007705,"Veritas der Finstere","Ich werde euch ein gnädiges Ende bereiten. Ruht in der Umarmung meiner Finsternis ...
... Für alle Ewigkeit!"|None|100000102,"Rain","Lasswell, Fina!
Jetzt gilt's!"|None|None|305011000|None^100007705,"Veritas el tenebroso","... Vosotros otra vez.
¿No se suponía que estabais... muertos?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Supongo que somos una caja de sorpresas, ¿no?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Seguirte hasta las ruinas ha sido un paseo."|None|100007705,"Veritas el tenebroso","Mmm.
Déjate de chulerías, gusano."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Ahí... en tu mano. Eso es lo que venías buscando."|None|100007705,"Veritas el tenebroso","...Qué astuto. Pero esta sabiduría no detendrá vuestra inevitable caída."|None|100000302,"Fina","¡Ja! ¡Si alguien tiene que caer aquí, eres tú!"|None|100007705,"Veritas el tenebroso","Es hora de irse a la cama, niña. Duerme en el dulce abrazo de la oscuridad. ¡Para toda la eternidad!"|None|100000102,"Rain","¡Lasswell, Fina! ¡Aquí viene!"|None|None|305011000|None

P_COMMAND_PARAM:
100000102,レイン,フィーナはなんのために戦ってるんだ？:None:100000315,フィーナ,決まってるわ。
己のプライドとヘスの独立のためよ。:None:100000315,フィーナ,そういうあなたは
なんのために戦ってるの？:None:100000102,レイン,その質問に答えるのは難しいな……。:None:100000315,フィーナ,くだらない人ね。
守るべきものがないというの？:None:100000102,レイン,違う違う。
俺、守るべきものがたくさんあってさ。:None:100000102,レイン,それでパッと言うのが難しかったんだ。:None:100000102,レイン,でも、１つ言えっていうんだったら、
今一番俺が守りたいものは……。:None:none:none
P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000102,"Rain","What is it you are fighting for, Fina?"|None|100000315,"Fina","I know exactly. I'm fighting for pride and for the independence of Hess."|None|100000315,"Fina","And what is it that you who asks so is fighting for?"|None|100000102,"Rain","That's a hard question to answer..."|None|100000315,"Fina","How trivial. Are you saying you have nothing to protect?"|None|100000102,"Rain","That's not it. I have many things I need to protect, in fact."|None|100000102,"Rain","It's just hard to name them off so suddenly."|None|100000102,"Rain","But if I had to say one, then what I really want to protect is..."|None|none|none^100000102,"雷因","菲娜究竟為什麼而戰鬥？"|None|100000315,"菲娜","還用問嗎。
為了自己的尊嚴和赫斯的獨立。"|None|100000315,"菲娜","你呢？
你又是為何而戰？"|None|100000102,"雷因","這個問題很難回答啊……"|None|100000315,"菲娜","真是可悲的人。
就沒有值得守護的東西嗎？"|None|100000102,"雷因","不是不是。
我，有太多要保護的東西。"|None|100000102,"雷因","不知道該怎麼總結。"|None|100000102,"雷因","不過，如果要說１個的話，
我現在最想保護的是……"|None|none|none^100000102,"레인","피나는 뭘 위해 싸우고 있어?"|None|100000315,"피나","뻔한 질문이로군.
내 자존심과 헤스의 독립을 위해서야."|None|100000315,"피나","그러는 넌,
뭘 위해서 싸우고 있지?"|None|100000102,"레인","답하기 힘든 질문이네…"|None|100000315,"피나","시시한 남자.
넌 지키고 싶은 것도 없어?"|None|100000102,"레인","아니, 설마.
오히려 지키고 싶은 것들이 너무 많거든."|None|100000102,"레인","그 중에서 하나만 선택하려니 난감해서 말이야."|None|100000102,"레인","하지만 무슨 일이 있어도 선택해야 한다면,
지금 내가 가장 지키고 싶은 건…"|None|none|none^100000102,"Rain","Pour quelle raison te bats-tu Fina ?"|None|100000315,"Fina","C'est évident non ? Je me bats pour l'indépendance et la fierté de Hess."|None|100000315,"Fina","Et toi alors ? Pour qu'elle raison te bats-tu ?"|None|100000102,"Rain","C'est une question à laquelle j'ai du mal à répondre..."|None|100000315,"Fina","Quel homme pitoyable tu fais. Serais-tu en train de me dire que tu n'as rien à protéger ?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Ce n’est pas ce que je veux dire. C'est même plutôt le contraire. Je veux protéger tant de choses."|None|100000102,"Rain","C'est juste difficile de toutes les nommer ici et maintenant."|None|100000102,"Rain","Mais si je devais ne t'en donner qu'une ce serait..."|None|none|none^100000102,"Rain","Wofür kämpfst du, Fina?"|None|100000315,"Fina","Das weiß ich genau. Ich kämpfe für die Ehre und Unabhängigkeit der Hess."|None|100000315,"Fina","Und wofür kämpfst du, der du diese Frage stellst?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Das ist eine schwere Frage ..."|None|100000315,"Fina","Wie banal. Heißt das, es gibt nichts, was du schützen willst?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Das ist es nicht. Ich will nur so viele Dinge beschützen."|None|100000102,"Rain","Es ist nicht leicht, sie plötzlich alle zu benennen."|None|100000102,"Rain","Aber wenn ich eine Sache nennen müsste, dann wäre das ..."|None|none|none^100000102,"Rain","¿Cuál es el motivo por el que luchas, Fina?"|None|100000315,"Fina","Pues lucho por el orgullo y la independencia de Hess."|None|100000315,"Fina","¿Y tú que preguntas, por qué luchas?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Difícil pregunta..."|None|100000315,"Fina","Qué frívolo. Entonces, ¿no tienes nada que proteger?"|None|100000102,"Rain","No es así. De hecho, hay muchas cosas que quiero proteger."|None|100000102,"Rain","Pero es difícil que se me vengan a la cabeza así a bote pronto."|None|100000102,"Rain","Aunque si tengo que decirte una, pues lucho por proteger..."|None|none|none

P_COMMAND_PARAM:
100000703,ジェイク,こんなのがずっと、
帝国の下に眠ってたのかよ？:None:100000403,ニコル,伝承などはなかったのですか？:None:100000703,ジェイク,あいにくだが、教養とは無縁でね。:None:100000703,ジェイク,それに、皇帝は独裁に入ってから
歴史なんかの情報を統制したんだ。:None:100000703,ジェイク,戦争の記録が重点的に焼かれた。
俺が子供のころに読めりゃなあ。:None:100000202,ラスウェル,不都合な本を焼き……
もみ消した歴史の中に、幻獣が？:None:100000102,レイン,最強の幻獣、バハムートのことを
もみ消して得をするのは誰なんだ。:None:none:407031004,0,39:none
P_COMMAND_PARAM_LOCAL:
100000703,"Jake","So this lay asleep below the empire for this long, huh?"|None|100000403,"Nichol","Was it not spoken of in your history or folklore?"|None|100000703,"Jake","Sorry, but I'm not so big on history lessons."|None|100000703,"Jake","Besides, once the emperor became a despot, most of our historical documents were restricted."|None|100000703,"Jake","All records of war were burnt, like the ones I used to read as a child."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Destroying a questionable past... I wonder if this esper was part of it."|None|100000102,"Rain","Who would try to cover up Bahamut, the strongest esper of all time?"|None|none|407031004,0,39|none^100000703,"傑科","這種東西竟然
一直沉睡在帝國的地下？"|None|100000403,"尼科爾","就沒有傳說記載牠的事嗎？"|None|100000703,"傑科","不好意思，我就沒好好讀過書。"|None|100000703,"傑科","況且，自從皇帝開始獨裁統治，
歷史等情報就被管制了。"|None|100000703,"傑科","尤其是戰爭的歷史，都被燒毀了。
要是我小時候愛讀書就好了。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","燒掉對自己不利的書……
而這幻獸就包含在被抹消的歷史中……"|None|100000102,"雷因","抹消最強幻獸巴哈姆特，
這樣做誰會受益呢……"|None|none|407031004,0,39|none^100000703,"제이크","이런 놈이 지금까지
제국의 지하에 잠들어 있었다니."|None|100000403,"니콜","관련된 전설 같은 건 없었나요?"|None|100000703,"제이크","미안하지만 교양과는 담을 쌓고 살았거든."|None|100000703,"제이크","게다가 황제의 독재가 시작되면서
역사를 비롯한 여러 정보의 통제가 시작됐지."|None|100000703,"제이크","특히 전쟁에 대한 기록은 죄다 가장 먼저 불태워졌어.
어렸을 때 읽어둘 걸 그랬군."|None|100000202,"라스웰","감추고 싶은 역사가 기록된 책을 불태웠다…
그리고 그 역사 속에 환수가?"|None|100000102,"레인","최강의 환수, 바하무트의 존재를
지워서 가장 득을 보게 되는 사람은 누굴까."|None|none|407031004,0,39|none^100000703,"Jake","Comment a-t-elle pu dormir si longtemps sous l'empire ?"|None|100000403,"Nichol","Personne n'a jamais tenté de faire quelque chose ?"|None|100000703,"Jake","Désolé, mais j'ai jamais été très doué en histoire."|None|100000703,"Jake","En plus, lorsque l'empire a sombré dans la dictature, la plupart de nos documents historiques ont été rendus inaccessibles."|None|100000703,"Jake","Tous les écrits traitant de la guerre ont été brûlés comme ceux que je lisais lorsque j'étais enfant."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Ils essayaient d'effacer le passé... Je me demande si cette chimère en faisait partie ?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Qui voudrait cacher Bahamut, la chimère la plus puissante de tous les temps ?"|None|none|407031004,0,39|none^100000703,"Jake","Diese Bestie schlief so lange Zeit unterhalb des Imperiums?"|None|100000403,"Nichol","Ist dazu nichts überliefert?"|None|100000703,"Jake","Leider nein, ich habe darüber nichts gelesen."|None|100000703,"Jake","Außerdem sind die meisten historischen Schriften verboten, seitdem das Imperium zu einer Diktatur wurde."|None|100000703,"Jake","Alle Kriegsbücher wurden verbrannt, genau wie die Bücher, die ich als Kind las."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Die Vergangenheit auslöschen ... ob dieser Esper ein Teil davon war?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Wer sollte Bahamut verbergen wollen, den stärksten Esper aller Zeiten?"|None|none|407031004,0,39|none^100000703,"Jake","Así que esta cosa ha estado durmiendo bajo el Imperio todo este tiempo, ¿eh?"|None|100000403,"Nichol","¿No aparece nada sobre ello en ninguna leyenda popular?"|None|100000703,"Jake","Lo siento, pero no soy precisamente aficionado a la historia."|None|100000703,"Jake","Y tras volverse el emperador un tirano, la mayoría de documentos fueron censurados."|None|100000703,"Jake","Los registros de la guerra fueron incinerados, como aquellos que leía de chavalín."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Enterrar un pasado deleznable... Me pregunto que esper estuvo implicado."|None|100000102,"Rain","¿Quién iba a querer ocultar a Bahamut, el más poderoso de los espers?"|None|none|407031004,0,39|none

幻影みたいなもんなんだよな。:None:100000202,ラスウェル,そういうことらしいな。
だが……相当、手強いぞ。:None:100000102,レイン,つまり、こいつと何度も戦えば
本体に与える傷も大きいはずだ。:None:100000302,フィーナ,そうすれば……
完全な復活を防げる？:None:100000403,ニコル,先延ばしにはできるはずです。
やる価値は十分でしょう。:None:100000503,リド,よーっし！
みんな、気合入れて行くよ！:None:100000202,ラスウェル,……なんでお前が張り切るんだ。:None:100000102,レイン,ラスウェルはやる気じゃないのか？:None:100000202,ラスウェル,そのように見えるか？:None:100000102,レイン,いや……逆だな。
何度でも戦うぞ！:None:none:none

0, ,"The vision of Bahamut has vanished."|None|None|30|100000703,"Jake","It appears we defeated another of that thing's shadows."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","I think you're right. But still, it was quite strong."|None|100000102,"Rain","But ultimately, the more we fight against it, the more damage we inflict to the true beast."|None|100000302,"Fina","If we do that, maybe we'll be able to prevent it from fully reviving."|None|100000403,"Nichol","We mustn't put this off any longer. We need to strike while the iron's hot."|None|100000503,"Lid","All right! Get pumped, everyone! Let's do this!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","...What has put you in such high spirits?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Where's your motivation, Lasswell?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Don't I look motivated?"|None|100000102,"Rain","No, quite the opposite. Let's do this, as many times as it takes!"|None|none|none^0, ,"巴哈姆特的幻影消失了。"|None|None|30|100000703,"傑科","剛才打倒的，
是那個幻獸的幻影。"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","似乎是這樣的。
這幻獸真是難對付。"|None|100000102,"雷因","也就是說只要不斷挑戰牠，
就能給予幻獸本體傷害？"|None|100000302,"菲娜","這樣就能
防止牠的完全復活了？"|None|100000403,"尼科爾","起碼可以拖延一些時間，

大家鼓足士氣上吧！"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","……妳為什麼這麼幹勁十足啊。"|None|100000102,"雷因","拉斯韋爾沒有幹勁嗎？"|None|100000202,"拉斯韋爾","我看起來像是沒有幹勁嗎？"|None|100000102,"雷因","不……正相反。
不管多少次我們都會上前挑戰的！"|None|none|none^0, ,"바하무트의 환영이 사라졌습니다."|None|None|30|100000703,"제이크","지금 쓰러트린 건
그 환수의 환영 같은 존재지?"|None|100000202,"라스웰","아무래도 그런 모양이다.
하지만… 만만치 않은 상대로군."|None|100000102,"레인","즉, 환영을 처치하면 할수록
본체에 가해지는 충격도 커질 거야."|None|100000302,"피나","그렇게 되면…
완전히 부활하는 걸 막을 수 있을까?"|None|100000403,"니콜","적어도 부활을 미룰 수는 있겠죠.
시도해볼 만한 가치는 충분합니다."|None|100000503,"리드","좋았어~!
다들 힘내자~!"|None|100000202,"라스웰","…왜 네가 의욕이 넘치지?"|None|100000102,"레인","라스웰은 안 내켜?"|None|100000202,"라스웰","그렇게 보여?"|None|100000102,"레인","아니… 전혀.
좋아, 얼마든지 덤벼라!"|None|none|none^0, ,"La vision de Bahamut a disparu."|None|None|30|100000703,"Jake","Apparemment on vient de se débarrasser d'une des ombres de cette chose."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","On dirait bien en effet. Enfin, elle était plutôt forte pour une ombre."|None|100000102,"Rain","Donc, à chaque fois qu'on arrive à vaincre une de ces choses, on inflige de plus en plus de dégâts à la vraie créature."|None|100000302,"Fina","Et en faisant ça on finira peut -être par éviter qu'elle ne revienne complètement à la vie."|None|100000403,"Nichol","Nous ferions mieux de ne pas traîner. Il vaut mieux battre le fer tant qu'il est chaud."|None|100000503,"Lid","Super ! Allez les gars ! Passons aux choses sérieuses !"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","... D'où sors-tu cet incroyable esprit combatif ?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Et toi Lasswell ? Tu n'as pas envie d'en découdre ?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","M'as-tu bien regardé, Rain ?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Ben justement, on dirait que tu n'as pas envie. Allez allons-y ! Combattons autant de fois qu'il le faudra !"|None|none|none^0, ,"Die Vision von Bahamut ist verschwunden."|None|None|30|100000703,"Jake","Wir haben noch eines von diesen Schattendingern besiegt."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Ich glaube, du hast recht. Es war ganz schön stark."|None|100000102,"Rain","Anders gesagt, je mehr wir es bekämpfen, desto mehr Schaden fügen wir der wahren Bestie zu."|None|100000302,"Fina","Auf diese Weise können wir seine Wiedergeburt vielleicht verhindern."|None|100000403,"Nichol","Wir dürfen nicht länger zögern. Wir müssen zuschlagen, so lange wir können."|None|100000503,"Lid","In Ordnung! Seid bereit, alle! Legen wir los!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","... Warum bist du so motiviert?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Wo ist deine Motivation, Lasswell?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Sehe ich nicht motiviert aus?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Nein, im Gegenteil. Nehmen wir uns alle Zeit, die wir brauchen!"|None|none|none^0, ,"La visión de Bahamut se ha desvanecido."|None|None|30|100000703,"Jake","Parece que hemos acabado con otra de esas sombras."|None|100000202,"Lasswell","Parece que sí. Pero, aun así, ha costado bastante."|None|100000102,"Rain","Al final, cuanto más luchemos contra ella, más daño le hacemos a su verdadero ser."|None|100000302,"Fina","Si seguimos así, a lo mejor impedimos que se pueda revivir."|None|100000403,"Nichol","No podemos postergar esto. Tenemos que atacar mientras tengamos la oportunidad."|None|100000503,"Lid","¡De acuerdo! ¡Venga, chicos! ¡Vamos a ello!"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","... ¿Qué haces tú tan animado?"|None|100000102,"Rain","¿Dónde está tu motivación, Lasswell?"|None|100000202,"Lasswell","¿No te parece que esté yo animado?"|None|100000102,"Rain","Más bien lo contrario. ¡Vamos a seguir dándole cuantas veces sea necesario!"|None|none|none
